Package net.silthus.schat.events.channel

Class JoinChannelEvent

java.lang.Object
net.silthus.schat.events.channel.JoinChannelEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cancellable, SChatEvent
public class JoinChannelEvent extends Object implements SChatEvent, Cancellable
The event is fired before a chatter joins a channel and allows the manipulation of the JoinChannelPolicy and outcome of the JoinChannelCommand.

The event will not be triggered if the channel is joined directly via Chatter.join(Channel).
